transArray.content: The house is a little smaller.

Dear guests, our hotel has different room types. You can ask the front desk to change you to a larger room type next time you check in. Thank you for your recognition of the hotel. The hotel is very close to the newly opened Beijing Chaoyang Railway Station. It is within walking distance. It only takes 8 minutes. The transportation at the door is also very convenient. There are many places to go out to eat. The hotel is a new product of Hanting in version 2.7. The breakfast is very rich and there is a self-service free laundry room. We look forward to your next stay.
